segments.text: The boy on the stool is really stretching to reach those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the stool is unstable and might tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He seems determined to get those cookies, no matter what.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if he realizes how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him looks eager to get a cookie too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit worried watching them like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They must really want those cookies to take such a risk.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around and sees them before something bad happens.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's balance looks so precarious; it's making me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they should just ask for the cookies instead of doing this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation seems like an accident waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
